interpretation:
The "raised back of hand" emoji represents a gesture of stopping or pausing. It can indicate a need to take a break and reassess a situation. This card may suggest that you are feeling overwhelmed or need to take a step back to gain a new perspective. It can also indicate a need for boundaries, either setting them for yourself or respecting the boundaries of others. 

When this card appears in a reading, it may be time to slow down and take a moment to gather your thoughts. It can also be a reminder to respect the boundaries of others and not push too hard. This card can offer a sense of relief, as it suggests that it is okay to take a break and regroup. Trust that taking a pause can lead to greater clarity and understanding in the long run.
